name: debug-plus
description: An enhanced drop-in replacement for the superb `debug` module. `debug-plus` adds semantic sugar for `console`-style logging of various types of messages such as `log`, `warn`, `error`, or even `dir`. Also includes helper methods such as `stringify`, `inspect`, and `timestamp` are also available to help the debugging process.
author: Elliot Chong <code@elliotjameschong.com>
